title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with chat history and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistence support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Dockerfiles and compose examples for CPU & GPU (CUDA/ROCm) containers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JS/TS bindings for the Ollama local server.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package – Python client for chatting, embedding, and managing Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds local AI commands (summarize, rewrite, translate) via Ollama.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template with session memory, model selector, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s API.

title: ollama-kit
summary: Swift package for iOS/macOS apps to chat with local Ollama models over HTTP.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models via async views and admin actions.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-Mode to answer questions with Ollama models.
